MECHJEB REQUIRED!

The Space Station Prometheus is not fully stock(mechjeb needed)

Image:

http://www./view/?kxk7i0z83qq6r35#

Image 2:

http://www./view/?j23g2e731zdba69#

Features:

+Cool look

+Docking arm

+Enought fuel to orbit

+Can be added DYJ Crew Tank(I love this mod :3).

-Need mechjeb

-Hard to dock

Comlete Prometheus Pack Include:.craft,persistence,MechJeb(Only download link).

Complete Prometheus pack:

http://www./?48vlpfpm52vks27
Any chance of a few screenshots of it on the launchpad/in orbit? Sounds great, though!
reminds me of mass effects citidel
There ARE ONLY screenshots on the orbit but today i will upload screenshot on the launchpad.

Love your take on the Prometheus starship. I have a similar version that I was working on for a while and released today. > lol You can find it under the post called "Large Starships". Please don't take this as me stealing your thunder... you have an amazing ship too! I just wanted to share with you since your a great builder and we think large scale.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/16883-Large-Starships

Edited August 18, 2012 by kerby1883

I has don't know you have too prometheus,my is space station.I has been on Prometheus(film)and i can't name that,so i use the name from the film.Anyway,i got "stock" station,but you use mods and you got bigger.But your is better.I don't like bigger mods,i only use DYJ crew tank,now i don't use mechjeb.But is hard to get this to orbit manually.
I couldn't test yet. I cannot run the game, it seems some mod is not working and the game doesn't load it.

Ok is it meant to already be in space? Cos I downloaded the files and put them where they where ment to be and found that the space station was already in space but didn't seem to respond to anything I did, I says it still had 6 tanks full of fual but I can't seem to get the thing to work for the life of me
